entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 1:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
